title: Quantum 3
description: Quantum 3 is an educational match-3 game for all ages where fun meets quantum physics! Build subatomic particles, learn about the mysteries of fundamental physics and deploy antimatter to clear the way!

title: Mechalangelo
description:
Mechalangelo is an asyncronous 1-vs-1 multiplayer game for the HTC Vive (via Steam VR) and an Xbox 360 controller 
 The VR player takes on the role of Mechalangelo, a giant painting machine. 
 The controller player takes on the role of the agile, well-equipped glider. 
 First to destroy the other wins!

title: Everything is Magnet
description: Everything is Magnet is a single-player adventure puzzle platformer about using magnets to guide an android who cannot jump through various environments.

title: Bot
description: Survive for as long as you can in this energy-based collectathon!
